card.name: Atinlay Igpay
card.property: Oubleday ikestray Enwhay ouyay eakspay ay onnay-igpay-atinlay ordway, acrificesay Atinlay Igpay.

card.name: AWOL
card.property: Exile target attacking creature. Then remove it from the game. Then put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

card.name: Bosom Buddy
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, you may gain ½ life for each word in that spell's name.

card.name: Cardpecker
card.property: Flying Gotcha — If an opponent touches the table with their hand, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Cardpecker from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cheap Ass
card.property: Spells you cast cost {½} less to cast.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Art
card.property: As Circle of Protection: Art enters, choose an artist. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. {1}{W}: Return Circle of Protection: Art to its owner's hand.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim “Stop the Da Vinci Beatdown” Pavelec

card.name: Collector Protector
card.property: {W}, Give an opponent a nonland card you own from outside the game: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you or Collector Protector this turn.

card.name: Drawn Together
card.property: As Drawn Together enters, choose an artist. Creatures with art by the chosen artist get +2/+2.

card.name: Emcee
card.property: Whenever another creature enters, you may stand up and say in a deep, booming voice, "Presenting . . . " and that creature's name. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Erase (Not the Urza's Legacy One)
card.property: If you control two or more white permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete “Yes the Urza's Legacy One” Venters

card.name: Fascist Art Director
card.property: {W} {W}: Fascist Art Director gains protection from the artist of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: First Come, First Served
card.property: Each attacking or blocking creature with the lowest collector number among attacking or blocking creatures has first strike.

card.name: Frankie Peanuts
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may ask target player a yes-or-no question. If you do, that player answers the question truthfully and abides by that answer if able until end of turn.

card.name: Head to Head
card.property: You and target opponent play Seven Questions with the top card of that player's library. If you win, prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by a source of your choice. (To play Seven Questions, that player looks at the card, then you ask up to six yes-or-no questions about the card that they answer truthfully. You guess the card's name—that's question seven—then the player reveals the card.)

card.name: Ladies' Knight
card.property: Flying Spells cast by players wearing at least one item of women's clothing cost {1} less to cast. (You can define women's clothing as you see fit. Be reasonable.)

card.name: Little Girl
card.property: {HW}

card.name: Look at Me, I'm R&D
card.property: As Look at Me, I'm R"D comes into play, choose a number and a second number one higher or one lower than that number. All instances of the first chosen number on permanents, spells, and cards in any zone are the second chosen number.

card.name: Man of Measure
card.property: As long as you're shorter than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +0/+1 and has first strike. As long as you're taller than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +1/+0.

card.name: Save Life
card.property: Choose one — • Target player gains 2½ life. • Prevent the next 2½ damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Gotcha — If an opponent says "save" or "life," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Save Life from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Standing Army
card.property: As long as you're standing, Standing Army has vigilance.

card.name: Staying Power
card.property: "Until end of turn" and "this turn" effects don't end.

card.name: Wordmail
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each word in its name.
{1}: This card's name becomes the card name of your choice. Activate anywhere, anytime.

card.name: Ambiguity
card.property: Whenever a player plays a spell that counters a spell that has been played or a player plays a spell that comes into play with counters, that player may counter the next spell played or put an additional counter on a permanent that has already been played, but not countered.

card.name: Artful Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever a permanent that shares an artist with another permanent you control enters, untap Artful Looter.

card.name: Avatar of Me
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each ten years you've been alive. Avatar of Me's power is equal to your height in feet and its toughness is equal to your American shoe size. Round to the nearest ½. Avatar of Me is the color of your eyes.

card.name: Brushstroke Paintermage
card.property: {T}: Target permanent's artist becomes the artist of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron “Don't You Dare Change Me” Spears

card.name: Bursting Beebles
card.property: Bursting Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls two or more nonland permanents that share an artist.

card.name: Carnivorous Death-Parrot
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Carnivorous Death-Parrot unless you say its flavor text.

card.name: Cheatyface
card.property: If Cheatyface is in your hand, you may sneak Cheatyface onto the battlefield. If an opponent catches you right away, that player may exile Cheatyface. Flying

card.name: Double Header
card.property: Flying When Double Header enters, you may return target permanent with a two-word name to its owner's hand.

card.name: Flaccify
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}{½}.

card.name: Framed!
card.property: Choose an artist. Tap all untapped permanents with art by that artist or untap all tapped permanents with art by that artist.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alan “Don't Feel Like You Have to Pick Me” Pollack

card.name: Greater Morphling
card.property: {2}: Greater Morphling gains your choice of banding, bushido 1, double strike, fear, flying, first strike, haste, landwalk of your choice, protection from a color of your choice, provoke, rampage 1, shadow, or trample until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling becomes the colors of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling's expansion symbol becomes the symbol of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling's art becomes by the artist of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn. {2}: Untap Greater Morphling.

card.name: Johnny, Combo Player
card.property: {4}: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Loose Lips
card.property: Enchant creature As Loose Lips enters, choose a sentence with eight or fewer words. Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, that player may say the chosen sentence. If they don't, you draw two cards.

card.name: Magical Hacker
card.property: {U}: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of + with -, and vice versa, until end of turn.

card.name: Mise
card.property: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

card.name: Moniker Mage
card.property: {U}, Say your middle name: Moniker Mage gains shroud until end of turn. {U}, Say an opponent's middle name: Moniker Mage gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Mouth to Mouth
card.property: Choose target opponent and target creature they control. You and that player have a breath-holding contest. If you win, you gain control of that creature.

card.name: Now I Know My ABC's
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control permanents with names that include all twenty-six letters of the English alphabet, you win the game.

card.name: Number Crunch
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Gotcha — If an opponent says a number, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Number Crunch from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Question Elemental?
card.property: Did you know this creature has flying? Are you aware that any time you say something that isn't a question, when a player points out this fact first, they gain control of Question Elemental?

card.name: Richard Garfield, Ph.D.
card.property: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)

card.name: Smart Ass
card.property: Whenever Smart Ass attacks, choose a card name. If defending player has no cards with the chosen name in their hand, they may reveal their hand. If they don't reveal their hand, Smart Ass can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Spell Counter
card.property: Counter target spell. Gotcha — If an opponent says "spell" or "counter," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Spell Counter from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Topsy Turvy
card.property: The phases of each player's turn are reversed. (The phases are, in reverse order, ending, second main, combat, first main, and beginning.) As long as there are more than two players in the game, the turn order is reversed.

card.name: Aesthetic Consultation
card.property: Choose an artist. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with art by the chosen artist. Put that card in your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Bad Ass
card.property: {1} {B}, Growl: Regenerate Bad Ass.

card.name: Bloodletter
card.property: When the names of three or more nonland permanents begin with the same letter, sacrifice Bloodletter. If you do, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Booster Tutor
card.property: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

card.name: Duh
card.property: Destroy target creature with reminder text. (Reminder text is any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

card.name: Enter the Dungeon
card.property: Players play a Magic subgame under the table, starting at 5 life and using their libraries as their decks. The winner searches their library for two cards, puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles.

card.name: Eye to Eye
card.property: You and target creature's controller have a staring contest. If you win, destroy that creature.

card.name: The Fallen Apart
card.property: The Fallen Apart enters with two arms and two legs. Whenever damage is dealt to The Fallen Apart, remove an arm or a leg from it. The Fallen Apart can't attack if it has no legs and can't block if it has no arms.

card.name: Farewell to Arms
card.property: As Farewell to Arms enters, choose a hand attached to an opponent's arm. When the chosen hand isn't behind its owner's back, sacrifice Farewell to Arms. If you do, that player discards their hand . . . of cards. (The lawyers wouldn't let us do it the other way.)

card.name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil
card.property: Flying, first strike, trample Once each turn, while you're searching your library, you may pay {1}{B}, reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library and say "I'm coming, too!" If you do, Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 2 damage to a player of your choice.

card.name: Kill! Destroy!
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Gotcha — If an opponent says "kill" or "destroy," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Kill! Destroy! from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mother of Goons
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, sacrifice Mother of Goons unless you insult that creature.

card.name: Necro-Impotence
card.property: Skip your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay X life. If you do, untap X permanents. Pay ½ life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Persecute Artist
card.property: Choose an artist other than Rebecca Guay. Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with art by the chosen artist.

card.name: Phyrexian Librarian
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library and balance it on your body. When a balanced card falls or touches another balanced card, sacrifice Phyrexian Librarian.

card.name: Stop That
card.property: Target player discards a card. Gotcha — If an opponent audibly flicks the cards in their hand, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Stop That from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tainted Monkey
card.property: {T}: Choose a word. Target player mills a card. If a card with the chosen word in its text box was milled this way, they lose 3 life.

card.name: Vile Bile
card.property: Whenever a player's skin or fingernail touches Vile Bile, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Wet Willie of the Damned
card.property: Wet Willie of the Damned deals 2½ damage to any target and you gain 2½ life.

card.name: When Fluffy Bunnies Attack
card.property: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of times the letter of your choice appears in that creature's name.

card.name: Working Stiff
card.property: As Working Stiff enters, straighten your arms. When you bend an elbow, sacrifice Working Stiff.

card.name: Zombie Fanboy
card.property: As Zombie Fanboy enters, choose an artist. Whenever a permanent with art by the chosen artist is put into a graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on Zombie Fanboy.

card.name: Zzzyxas's Abyss
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all nonland permanents with the first name alphabetically among nonland permanents.

card.name: Assquatch
card.property: Each other Donkey gets +1½/+1½. Whenever another Donkey enters, untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Blast from the Past
card.property: Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R} Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

card.name: Curse of the Fire Penguin
card.property: Enchant creature Curse of the Fire Penguin consumes and confuses enchanted creature.

alternate.name: Curse of the Fire Penguin Creature
alternate.property: Trample When this creature dies, return Curse of the Fire Penguin to the battlefield.

card.name: Deal Damage
card.property: Deal Damage deals 4 damage to any target. Gotcha — If an opponent says "deal" or "damage," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Deal Damage from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dumb Ass
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, target opponent chooses whether Dumb Ass attacks this turn.

card.name: Face to Face
card.property: You and target opponent play a best two-out-of-three Rock, Paper, Scissors match. If you win, Face to Face deals 5 damage to that player.

card.name: Frazzled Editor
card.property: Protection from wordy (Something is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.)

card.name: Goblin Mime
card.property: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.

card.name: Goblin Secret Agent
card.property: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal a card from your hand at random.

card.name: Goblin S.W.A.T. Team
card.property: Say "Goblin S.W.A.T. Team": Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin S.W.A.T. Team unless an opponent swats the table within five seconds. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Mana Flair
card.property: Add {R} for each nonland permanent with art by the artist of your choice.

card.name: Mons's Goblin Waiters
card.property: Sacrifice a creature or land: Add {HR}.

card.name: Orcish Paratroopers
card.property: When Orcish Paratroopers enters, flip it from a height of at least one foot. Sacrifice Orcish Paratroopers unless it turns over completely at least once during the flip and lands face up.

card.name: Punctuate
card.property: Punctuate deals damage to target creature equal to half the number of punctuation marks in that creature's text box. (The punctuation marks are ! ? , ; : - — ( ) / " " ' ' " .)

card.name: Pygmy Giant
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Pygmy Giant deals X damage to target creature, where X is a number in the sacrificed creature's text box.

card.name: Red-Hot Hottie
card.property: Whenever Red-Hot Hottie deals damage to a creature, put a third-degree-burn counter on that creature. It gains "At the beginning of each end step, sacrifice this creature unless you scream 'Aaah!' at the top of your lungs."

card.name: Rocket-Powered Turbo Slug
card.property: Super haste (This may attack the turn before you cast it. (You may put this card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking during your declare attackers step. If you do, you lose the game at the beginning of your next turn's end step unless you pay this card's mana cost during that turn.))

card.name: Sauté
card.property: Sauté deals 3½ damage to any target.

card.name: Six-y Beast
card.property: As Six-y Beast enters, you secretly put six or fewer +1/+1 counters on it, then an opponent guesses the number of counters. If that player guesses right, sacrifice Six-y Beast after it enters.

card.name: Touch and Go
card.property: Destroy target land. Gotcha — If an opponent touches their face, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Touch and Go from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Yet Another Aether Vortex
card.property: All creatures have haste. Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. Noninstant, nonsorcery cards on top of a library are on the battlefield under their owner's control in addition to being in that library.

card.name: B-I-N-G-O
card.property: Trample Whenever a player casts a spell, put a chip counter on its mana value. B-I-N-G-O gets +9/+9 for each set of three numbers in a row with chip counters on them.

card.name: Creature Guy
card.property: Gotcha — If an opponent says "creature" or "guy," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Creature Guy from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Elvish House Party
card.property: Elvish House Party's power and toughness are each equal to the current hour, using the twelve-hour system.

card.name: Fat Ass
card.property: Fat Ass gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as you're eating. (Gum isn't food. We checked.)

card.name: Form of the Squirrel
card.property: As Form of the Squirrel enters, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. You lose the game when that creature leaves the battlefield. Creatures can't attack you. You have shroud. You can't cast spells.

card.name: Fraction Jackson
card.property: {G}, {T}: Return target card with a ½ on it from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Gluetius Maximus
card.property: As Gluetius Maximus enters, an opponent chooses one of your fingers. (Thumbs are fingers, too.) When the chosen finger isn't touching Gluetius Maximus, sacrifice Gluetius Maximus.

card.name: Granny's Payback
card.property: You gain life equal to your age.

card.name: Graphic Violence
card.property: All creatures with art by the artist of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Keeper of the Sacred Word
card.property: As Keeper of the Sacred Word enters, choose a word. Whenever an opponent says the chosen word, Keeper of the Sacred Word gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Land Aid '04
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If you sang a song the whole time you were searching and shuffling, you may untap that land.

card.name: Laughing Hyena
card.property: Gotcha — If an opponent laughs, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Laughing Hyena from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Monkey Monkey Monkey
card.property: As Monkey Monkey Monkey enters, choose a letter. Monkey Monkey Monkey gets +1/+1 for each nonland permanent whose name begins with the chosen letter.

card.name: Name Dropping
card.property: Gotcha — If an opponent says a word that's in the name of a card in your graveyard, you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return that card to your hand.

card.name: Old Fogey
card.property: Phasing, cumulative upkeep {1}, echo {G}{G}, fading 3, bands with other Dinosaurs, protection from Homarids, snow-covered plainswalk, flanking, rampage 2

card.name: Our Market Research Shows That Players Like Really Long Card Names So We Made this Card to Have the Absolute Longest Card Name Ever Elemental
card.property: Art rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, it gets +2/+2 for each creature in the blocker's art beyond the first.)

card.name: Remodel
card.property: If you control two or more green permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Exile target artifact.

card.name: Shoe Tree
card.property: Shoe Tree enters with up to two shoe counters on it. Use your shoes as counters. Shoe Tree gets +1/+1 for each shoe counter on it.

card.name: Side to Side
card.property: You and target opponent arm-wrestle. If you win, create a 3/3 green Ape creature token.

card.name: S.N.O.T.
card.property: You may have S.N.O.T. enter stuck to another creature named S.N.O.T. If you do, all those creatures form a single creature. S.N.O.T.'s power and toughness are each equal to the square of the number of cards named S.N.O.T. stuck together to form it. (One is a 1/1, two are a 4/4, three are a 9/9, and four are a 16/16. If you manage to get -1 S.N.O.T.s stuck together, it's a 1/1.)

card.name: Stone-Cold Basilisk
card.property: Whenever Stone-Cold Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with fewer letters in its name, destroy that creature at end of combat. (Punctuation and spaces aren't letters.) Whenever an opponent reads Stone-Cold Basilisk, that player is turned to stone until end of turn. Stoned players can't attack, block, cast spells, or activate abilities.

card.name: Supersize
card.property: Target creature gets +3½/+3½ until end of turn.

card.name: Symbol Status
card.property: Create a 1/1 colorless Expansion-Symbol creature token for each different expansion symbol among permanents you control.

card.name: Uktabi Kong
card.property: Trample When Uktabi Kong enters, destroy all artifacts. Tap two untapped Apes you control: Create a 1/1 green Ape creature token.

card.name: "Ach! Hans, Run!"
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may say "Ach! Hans, run! It's the . . ." and the name of a creature card. If you do, search your library for a card with that name, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Ass Whuppin'
card.property: Destroy target silver-bordered or acorn permanent in any game you can see from your seat.

card.name: Meddling Kids
card.property: As Meddling Kids enters, choose a word with four or more letters. Spells with the chosen word in their text box can't be cast.

card.name: Rare-B-Gone
card.property: Each player sacrifices all permanents that are rare or mythic rare, then each player reveals their hand and discards all cards that are rare or mythic rare.

card.name: Who // What // When // Where // Why
Gleemax
card.property: You choose all targets for all spells and abilities.

card.name: Letter Bomb
card.property: When Letter Bomb enters, sign it and shuffle it into target player's library. That player reveals each card they draw until they draw Letter Bomb. When that player draws Letter Bomb, it deals 19½ damage to them.

card.name: Mana Screw
card.property: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {C}{C}. Activate only as an instant.

card.name: Mox Lotus
card.property: {T}: Add {∞}. {100}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: My First Tome
card.property: {1}, {T}: Say the flavor text on a card in your hand. Target opponent guesses that card's name. You may reveal that card. If you do and they guessed wrong, you draw a card.

card.name: Pointy Finger of Doom
card.property: {3}, {T}: Spin Pointy Finger of Doom in the middle of the table so that it rotates completely at least once, then destroy the closest permanent the finger points to.

card.name: Rod of Spanking
card.property: {2}, {T}: Rod of Spanking deals 1 damage to target player. Then untap Rod of Spanking unless that player says "Thank you, sir. May I have another?"

card.name: Time Machine
card.property: {T}: Exile Time Machine and target nontoken creature you own. Return them to the battlefield at the beginning of your upkeep on your turn X in the next game you play with one of your opponents in this game, where X is the mana value of the exiled creature.

card.name: Togglodyte
card.property: Togglodyte enters turned on. Whenever a player casts a spell, toggle Togglodyte's ON/OFF switch. As long as Togglodyte is turned off, it can't attack or block, and prevent all damage it would deal.

card.name: Toy Boat
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Say "Toy Boat" quickly. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on Toy Boat, then sacrifice it unless you say "Toy Boat" once for each age counter on it—without pausing between or fumbling it.)

card.name: Urza's Hot Tub
card.property: {2}, Discard a card: Search your library for a card that shares a complete word in its name with the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Water Gun Balloon Game
card.property: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters, each player puts a pop! counter on "0." Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop! counter up one. Whenever a player's pop! counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop! counters to "0."

card.name: World-Bottling Kit
card.property: {5}, Sacrifice World-Bottling Kit: Choose a Magic set. Exile all permanents with that set's expansion symbol except for basic lands.

card.name: City of Ass
card.property: City of Ass enters tapped. {T}: Add one and one-half mana of any one color.

card.name: R&D's Secret Lair
card.property: Play cards as written. Ignore all errata. {T}: Add {C}. (This mana is still added to your mana pool.)

card.name: Super Secret Tech
card.property: Premium spells cost {1} less to cast. Premium creatures get +1/+1.
